samples.question: And you know what?
samples.transcript: I have helped her to take the ugliest photos of the year. Again, showing her sense of humor. Wonderful. I am sure they were not that ugly. And of course, it made her blood boil. Love that. Made her blood boil. Made her really angry, really frustrated. And at that time when she yelled at me, my heart sank. But now when I have a little bit of skill of photography, I am much more confident. In the future, I will learn more about photography because that is my passion. Thank you so much. Well done, Khan.

samples.question: What skills are important for young people today?
samples.transcript: I have a lot of idea about this question, but I would like the most important skill for adolescents is time management. Because you know, I found that my friends are really ambitious and, they want to handle everything in their life from work to work. earn money or learn new things, a lot of things. But you know the problem is they cannot manage their time. So like they use their sleep, sleep time just to earn more money like that. And I start to have the question like is the cost of success is our mental and physical health.
samples.transcript_original: Um, I have a lot of idea about this question, but I would like the most important skill for adolescents is time management. samples.question: What is your favorite part of your home?
samples.transcript: The favorite part of my home is actually my living room. it is where I spend the most time in at home. Now this sentence had great linking and chunking. there is a window that I can get sunlight from. Sometimes proficient English speakers might have a d sound show up there that I get, or there is more of a glottal that I, and both are.

samples.question: Will you stay there a long time, do you think?
samples.transcript: It is a difficult question because I actually like my place, but I think it is too old and not well maintained, so I would like to move out soon.

samples.question: Do you enjoy taking photos?
samples.transcript: I actually prefer to savour the moment rather than taking photos, but I do take photos when there is something important.
samples.transcript_original: I actually prefer to savour the moment rather than taking photos, but I do take photos when there is something important.
samples.transcript_cleaned: I actually prefer to savour the moment rather than taking photos, but I do take photos when there is something important.

samples.question: Do you use your phone or a camera for taking photos?
samples.transcript: I do not always have my cameras with me, so I usually take photos just with my phone. Why? It is too bulky to have the camera with me all the time, and these days, mobile phones have very good features for taking photos, and the images are usually high resolution, and it is much more convenient to use the mobile phone.
samples.transcript_original: I don't always have my cameras with me, so I usually take photos just with my phone. Why? samples.question: What do you do with the photos you take?
samples.transcript: I do not really do much with my phones, and the photos. I usually store in my phones or sometimes I transfer them into my hard disk for viewing later. Occasionally, I do share them with my friends and family just to let them know what I have done recently.
samples.transcript_original: I don't really do much with my phones, uh, and the photos. I usually store in my phones or sometimes I transfer them into my hard disk for viewing later. Occasionally, I do share them with my friends and family just to let them know what I've done recently.

samples.question: What a dislike about this house is because what a dislike is the fact that it is old and it is not well maintained.
samples.transcript: For example, there are not proper facilities in the bathroom and I remember having to scoop water out to take shower. samples.question: What kinds of home are most common in your country?
samples.transcript: Before we hear Vivian's response to this question, I just want to give you a pro tip.

samples.question: Alex asked what kinds of home are popular?
samples.transcript: So Vivian can give a few answers here. And I remember when I was an examiner, a lot of students would just give one answer and then stop. Remember, you are being given the chance to identify more than one. If you can think of only one, that is fine. But show that you have understood by saying something like that. And to be honest, that is it. let us see how Vivian responds. in Malaysia, people used to prefer bigger houses, but these days, more people live in apartments and condominiums because, they, they would like to live closer to public transport and the city center. So, not bad. She mentioned houses, but then she says apartments are better. a good way to extend this might be to say something like, sadly, most people cannot afford houses these days and then extend it. Or, or something else to extend the idea a bit as it was kind of a short answer. let us keep watching.

samples.question: What are the benefits of living in an apartment?
samples.transcript: I think there are many benefits associated to living in an apartment. One obvious benefit is the security because the body corporate usually hires security guards or implement good security system to increase the safety of the residents. there are also other benefits like more opportunities to interact with your neighbors because you live so close to each other. This answer is fine, but again, I would extend. So what?
samples.transcript_original: I think there are many benefits associated to living in an apartment. Um, there are also other benefits like um, more opportunities to interact with your neighbors because you live so close to each other. This answer is fine, but again, I would extend. So what?

This answer is fine, but again, I would extend.

samples.question: Do you think that in general, everybody wants to live in a big house?
samples.transcript: I think it used to be everyone's dream to have their own big space, but nowadays people are busy working, especially young adults. So they do not have a lot of time to maintain a big house. I think most people now will prefer a smaller space like an apartment unit, which is easier to maintain.
samples.transcript_original: I think it used to be everyone's dream to have their own big space, but nowadays people are busy working, especially young adults. samples.transcript_cleaned: I think it used to be everyone's dream to have their own big space, but nowadays people are busy working, especially young adults. So they do not have a lot of time to maintain a big house. I think most people now will prefer a smaller space like an apartment unit, which is easier to maintain.

samples.question: In your country, what is the typical age for people to move out of the family home?
samples.transcript: In my home country, I think people generally move out between the age of 25 and 30. Because this is when they get a stable job and be financially able to afford their own place.
samples.transcript_original: In my home country, I think people generally move out between the age of 25 and 30. Because this is when they get a stable job and be financially able to afford their own place.
